title: Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Study of Flat Landscape with Trees and Distant Mountain Peak", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Quick sketch of flat landscape. In distance at right and left, stands of trees. In far distance, large mountain at left-center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Study of Flat Landscape with Trees and Distant Mountain Peak", 1885–1902.
1885–1902. Graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-38.
